titleStmt.title: An Exact and particular account of the defeat given to the rebels in the county of Cork by the Lord Justice Cox and Coll. Hastings, with 2000 of the army and militia and of the Lord Lisburn's cutting off a party of the French and Irish horse near Lanesborough Pass / in a letter from Dublin, June the 25.

An Exact and particular account of the defeat given to the rebels in the county of Cork by the Lord Justice Cox and Coll. Hastings, with 2000 of the army and militia and of the Lord Lisburn's cutting off a party of the French and Irish horse near Lanesborough Pass / in a letter from Dublin, June the 25.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
